p.b: The word season has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the answer in which season means "to add more flavor to something."

simpleChoice.p: While he doesn't know how to play chess, I will season my brother by teaching him strategies.
My favorite season is winter. Dad says he doesn't like it, because he hates to shovel snow.
I wanted to buy blueberries, but we have to wait until next summer when they are in season.
My little brother hates broccoli. But if mom seasons the vegetables with herbs and spices, he will eat them.
